filename: Great are You Lord in E
title: Great Are You Lord
lyrics: David Leonard | Jason Ingram | Leslie Jordan Tempo - 144 | Time - 6/8
You give life You are love You bring light to the darkness
You give hope You re - store ev'ry heart that is broken
It's Your breath in our lungs
So we pour out our praise we pour out our praise
It's Your breath in our lungs
So we pour out our praise to You only
And all the earth will shout Your praise
Our hearts will cry these bones will sing
